## Installation

You can install the development version of ggraincloud from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("bradfordjohnson/ggraincloud")
```

## Example

Create a raincloud plot using `raincloud()`.

```{r example, fig.height=8, fig.width=6}
library(ggraincloud)

raincloud(iris, ggplot2::aes(Species, Sepal.Width), flip_coords = TRUE) +
  ggplot2::theme_minimal()

raincloud(
  iris,
  ggplot2::aes(
    Species,
    Sepal.Width,
    color = Species,
    fill = Species
  ),
  alpha = .5,
  flip_coords = FALSE
) +
ggplot2::theme_minimal()
```
